Title: Withholds the salary of the governor and members of the legislature if the budget is late until final ratification of the budget
Summary: Withholds the salary of the governor and members of the legislature if the budget is late until final ratification of the budget; forfeits withheld salary.
LawCode: Amd ยง24, St Fin L; amd ยง5, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the legislative law, in relation to withholding the salary of the governor and members of the legislature if the budget is late until final ratification of the budget
